content.prompt: In the veranda post of enthroned king and senior wife (Opo Ogoga), Olowe of Ise depicts the senior wife as a tall free-standing figure in order to

choices.label: reference her power as a healer
refer to her role in domestic life
reference her link to an important deity

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
